column2: Kagro in the Morning is INDEPENDENT of the alarm clock at 9 AM ET!
column5: Greg Dworkin the new Patriarch of the Eastern Orthodox Church has convinced me to take Independence Day off! I know we were just off last Wednesday but that was for a doctor’s appointment. That doesn’t count! Besides there’s nothing more American than being given an inch and taking a mile. So in that grand tradition I give you all last year’s July 6th episode. I thought about sticking with the idea of going way way back for the rerun but… well I’ll tell you the story later. But I thought it might be interesting to check in with ourselves a year ago when public health authorities were still wrestling with whether or not they could or should conclude that the coronavirus was airborne. And also the president was dumb. Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
